ModMetaData.name: Universal Pregnancy
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Removes gender requirements from everything related to reproduction, including IVF. Same-sex couples as well as opposite-sex couples can get each other pregnant (though not at the same time), and women can also impregnate men just as easily as the reverse.
=== Updates === 06/17/2025: Update to 1.6, fix parent relation label in baby feeding tab 01/07/2025: Fixed bug that gave 100% fertility at all ages 01/01/2025: Added compatibility with existing saves, added pregnancy chance tweakvalue
=== Credits === Mod icon: twitter.com/mouse_draws
